name: run-current-test
description: Run current test at cursor position

commands.title: Run current test and update snapshots

runCurrentTest.run.description:
Command to run for "Run current test" command. You can use following substitutions:
	${workspaceRoot}	 - your current workspace root
	${testFilePath}	 - absolute file path to test file
	${relativeTestPath}	 - relative file path to test file
	${testName}	 - test block name
	${fullTestName}	 - Full test block name, including parent test blocks (i.e describe test1 test2)

runCurrentTest.runAndUpdateSnapshots.description:
Command to run for "Run current test and update snapshots" command. You can use following substitutions:
	${workspaceRoot}	 - your current workspace root
	${testFilePath}	 - absolute file path to test file
	${relativeTestPath}	 - relative file path to test file
	${testName}	 - test block name
	${fullTestName}	 - Full test block name, including parent test blocks (i.e describe test1 test2)

runCurrentTest.usePreviousTestCommand.description: Use previous test command if no test blocks were found. Useful when editing source & test side-by-side and keep forgetting to switch to test source

runCurrentTest.testBlockIdentifiers.description: Array of test block names to match

runCurrentTest.testNameSeparator.description: String regex separator in test blocks when using ${fullTestName}

runCurrentTest.unknownTestNameLiteral.description: String regex identifier for any blocks which doesn't have name (or it can't be analyzed)
